changes.change: Added color compatibility with iOS 13.3.
Fixed a bug on iOS 13.3 where the sliders didn't get rounded.
Fixed lag when using random colors.
changes.changes: Fixed a bug that didn't apply custom colors on the media and volume modules. Fixed a bug that made custom colors "flash" when the module expanded on iOS 13.3 Fixed a bug on iOS 13.3 that made the custom colors dissapear on some modules when the media module was transitioning to compact state.

changes.change: Added optional custom color for the modules!
Added random colors for the modules.
Added custom color alpha for the modules.
Added optional brightness and audio sliders rounded
Added option to set sliders corner radius
Fixed a ton of bugs
Fixed a bug with a nasty transition between compact and expanded for the volume slider.
Reworked preferences, better quality icon.
Added custom corner radius for compact and expanded modules to configure from settings
Fixed a bug that made the volume hud get rounded sometimes
Fixed a bug that sometimes didn't apply the corner radius to the media module, and more that I don't remember.
Added support for 0 corner radius for a pretty cool look, see screenshots for a reference photo.
Added AirPlay glyph positioning settings, and to hide the AirPlay glyph
Added preferences to configure from settings
Added icon
Added screenshots to the depiction
Fixed a few bugs and made some animations smoother.
Fixed the AirPlay glyph in the nowplaying module to be in the middle of the module on all devices.
Initial Release
